rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A spacious entry area with a foyer designed to welcome guests and adhere to Vastu principles by aligning with the direction of auspicious energy.

rooms.name: Living Area & Open-Plan Kitchen
rooms.description: An expansive open-plan space merging the kitchen with the living area. The design incorporates Brutalist elements such as exposed concrete walls and raw finishes, complemented by modern lighting fixtures.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the open-plan zone, featuring a minimalist dining setup integrated into the living space for socializing while observing Vastu guidelines with optimal seating orientation.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: A functional bathroom on the ground floor, designed with water-efficient fixtures and a layout that respects local building norms.

openings.description: Main entrance door positioned according to Vastu principles for positive energy flow.
Large windows in the living area to enhance natural light and maintain an open aesthetic.
Doorway leading to a small balcony that provides ventilation and a connection with the outdoors, designed in a minimalist style.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A spacious bedroom designed for relaxation and optimal rest, incorporating Brutalist design elements like exposed concrete beams, with Vastu-compliant bed placement.

rooms.name: Closet & Study Area
rooms.description: Adjacent storage and a designated study area integrated within the master bedroom layout to maximize space usage in a duplex setup.

rooms.name: Rooftop Terrace
rooms.description: An expansive, open rooftop terrace offering panoramic views. The design adheres to Vastu guidelines by maintaining clear pathways for energy flow and uses durable materials in keeping with Brutalist aesthetics.

openings.description: A secure staircase connecting the ground floor to the upper floor, designed with safety features and adhering to local building norms.
Strategically placed window ensuring privacy while providing ample natural light as per Vastu recommendations.
